name: A Game A Week 3 - Godot Wild jam #38: Calculated Greenness
name_original: A Game A Week 3 - Godot Wild jam #38: Calculated Greenness
description:
You play as a planner trying to profit and achieving eco-friendly as most as you can! You have 4 buildings to choose from to make up the planet that most fits your agenda and achieve your goals in the limited time given!

Godot Wild Jam #38 theme: Solarpunk

Theme interpretations: So the first think when I heard of this was being eco-friendly and recycling. So about this topic I have heard a lot of people just randomly saying that everyone should just turn green without thinking about the funds or plan to do so. This is why I thought about combining solarpunk and the finances/profit when doing it. Although that said I don't know that much about finances and prices regarding this topic either.
